prompt: Create a bold login form interface with a high-contrast black and yellow theme. The UI should feature a centered single-column layout with a black background (Colors.black). At the top, display a 'Sign In Now' heading in a bold, 36px font with a bright yellow color (Colors.yellow[700]). Below, include a subtitle 'Access your account' in a 16px font with a light yellow color (Colors.yellow[200]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a sharp rectangular border (BorderRadius.zero), a yellow border (Colors.yellow[700]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Enter email'. The password TextField should have matching styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Enter password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should use a yellow focused border (Colors.yellow[700]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in yellow (Colors.yellow[700]) with a 14px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a yellow background (Colors.yellow[700]), black text (Colors.black), and sharp corners (BorderRadius.zero). At the bottom, include a row with 'Need an account?' text in light yellow followed by a 'Sign Up' link in yellow. Use 32 pixels padding around the main content and 16 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a black background with a strong yellow shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.yellow[900] with opacity 0.4, blurRadius 10). Ensure the layout is responsive with scrolling support.
